name: Lumia, Saint of the Crimson Lotus
text:
Swiftness
As this card enters your field, you may remove a card named "Nyarlathotep, the Crimson Radiance" in your hand from the game.
This card gains Imperishable and "When this card deals damage ? You gain that much life." as long as a card named "Nyarlathotep, the Crimson Radiance" is in your removed area and was removed by this card.
